entry.title: Thursday: A few showers. High 19 except 14 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning. High 19 except 14 near Lake Erie. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:02 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low 11.
